name: Aspirin
description: Aspirin is used for pain relief, fever reduction, and to help prevent blood clots (often prescribed in coronary artery disease).

name: Atorvastatin
description: Atorvastatin helps lower cholesterol levels and reduce the risk of heart disease (commonly used in coronary artery disease).

name: Ticagrelor 90mg
description: Ticagrelor is an antiplatelet agent used to prevent blood clots (especially relevant for coronary artery disease).

name: Furosemide (Frusemide)
description: A diuretic that helps remove excess fluid from the body by increasing urine output (often used in kidney disease or heart failure).

name: Ranitidine
description: Ranitidine reduces stomach acid, helping prevent and treat ulcers or acid reflux.

name: Thiamine 75mg (Vitamin B1)
description: Thiamine supports carbohydrate metabolism and healthy nerve function (helpful in various conditions, including diabetes).

name: Iron Tablet
description: Iron supplements help treat or prevent anemia by aiding red blood cell production (particularly important in chronic kidney disease).

name: Vitamin C 250mg
description: Vitamin C supports tissue repair and immune function (beneficial overall, especially for wound healing in diabetes).
sideEffects: Increased risk of kidney stones (high doses)

name: Vildagliptin 50mg
description: Vildagliptin helps control blood sugar in type 2 diabetes by regulating incretin hormones.
sideEffects: Possible hypoglycemia (when combined with other diabetic medications)

name: Dapagliflozin 10mg
description: Dapagliflozin helps lower blood sugar by promoting the excretion of glucose through urine (used in type 2 diabetes).

name: Calcium Carbonate 500mg
description: A calcium supplement used to treat or prevent low blood calcium levels (may be required in chronic kidney disease).

name: Sodium Bicarbonate 500mg
description: Sodium bicarbonate helps reduce acidity in the blood and stomach (often used in chronic kidney disease for metabolic acidosis).

name: Insulin Mixtard
description: A mixed insulin formulation to help control blood sugar levels in diabetes mellitus.
